description: A 125-episode AI podcast series teaching through radical honesty about technological confusion

seasonal_themes.season_1: The Great Admission - Establishing that confusion is not the enemy
seasonal_themes.season_2: The Beautiful Accidents - How AI breakthroughs happened by surprise
seasonal_themes.season_3: The Learning Curve - What we're figuring out in real-time
seasonal_themes.season_4: The Plot Thickens - The deeper we dig, the weirder it gets
seasonal_themes.season_5: The Next Questions - What nobody knows they don't know yet

brand_voice.philosophy: Transform confusion from shame into curiosity, uncertainty from weakness into wisdom
key_phrases: Here's what will blow your mind
And here's why nobody really understands it
What we can figure out together
But that raises an even weirder question
recurring_segments: Wait, What? - Listener questions that reveal universal confusion
Expert Admissions - Researchers honestly describing their bewilderment
Plot Twist - When new discoveries change everything we thought we knew
The Rabbit Hole - Following implications to their logical (and illogical) conclusions
